CustomField.description: If training date isn't set, use formula. otherwise, use training date.
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Training_Date__c)),Training_Date__c, CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "Contract Initiation", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 63, "Contract Negotiation", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 58, "Account Setup", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 27, "Installation pending", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 18, "Installation scheduled", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 15, Training_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: Expected Training Date
